scripts.name: Fill Comp
scripts.description: Applies a scale expression with padding controls. Adds a 'Padding Value' slider and a 'Percent Based' checkbox to each selected layer.

scripts.name: Fit Comp
scripts.description: Applies a scale expression with fit logic using sourceRectAtTime. Fits the layer's content within the comp boundaries using a padding value and a percent-based toggle.

scripts.name: Pin Position
scripts.description: Positions layers based on a user-selected pin location. Uses a dropdown for pin position along with padding controls to adjust layer placement.

scripts.name: Scale Text
scripts.description: Scales text layers so that their effective width does not exceed a specified 'Max Width'. Adds controls for 'Max Width', 'Base Scale', 'Continuous' updating, and 'Sample Time'.
